availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Phoebe Clem Trout in Trimble County on February 19, 1844. Married to Nancy E. Trout. Father of May C. Trout, Lafayette Trout, and Lucy Trout. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 76.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trimble County Marriages, Film #000420388.
Find A Grave, "Jacob Trout (May 7, 1820-April 24, 1904)," Memorial #74287418, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/74287418 (accessed August 14, 2018).
